languages.text: Несмотря на жестокие пытки и гнетущие волю препараты, введенные в кровь пленника мудрым техножрецом, мерзавец хранил высокомерное молчание и принял смерть прежде, чем хотя бы слово сорвалось с его уст.

Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.
languages.original_text: Несмотря на жестокие пытки и гнетущие волю препараты, введенные в кровь пленника мудрым техножрецом, мерзавец хранил высокомерное молчание и принял смерть прежде, чем хотя бы слово сорвалось с его уст.

traits.locale_text: Despite the brutal torture and willpower-sapping solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

Despite the brutal torture and willpower-sapping solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

languages.text: 尽管睿智的技术神甫对俘虏进行了残酷的折磨，向他的血管中注入了各种各样的物质，用来蛊惑这个囚犯的思想，但这个混蛋仍然保持着傲慢的沉默，一句话也没说就死了。
languages.original_text: Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

traits.locale_text: 尽管睿智的技术祭司对俘虏进行了残酷的折磨，向他的血管中注入了各种各样的物质，用来蛊惑这个囚犯的思想，但这个混蛋仍然保持着傲慢的沉默，一句话也没说就死了。

languages.text: 残忍な拷問と、賢明な技術司祭によって囚人の血流に様々な誘因作用と精神変容作用のある溶液が投与されたにもかかわらず、このロクデナシは傲慢にも沈黙を保ち、一言も口を開かぬうちに死んでしまった。
languages.original_text: Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

traits.locale_text: 残忍な拷問と、賢明な技術司祭によって囚人の血流に様々な誘因作用と精神変容作用のある溶液が投与されたにもかかわらず、このロクデナシは傲慢にも沈黙を保ち、一言も口を開かぬうちに死んでしまった。

languages.text: A pesar de la brutal tortura y de varias sustancias psicoactivas que un sabio tecnosacerdote introdujo en el torrente sanguíneo del prisionero, el desgraciado mantuvo su arrogante silencio y pereció antes de que una sola palabra saliera de su boca.
languages.original_text: Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

traits.locale_text: A pesar de la brutal tortura y de varias sustancias psicoactivas que un sabio tecnosacerdote introdujo en el torrente sanguíneo del prisionero, el desgraciado mantuvo su arrogante silencio y pereció antes de que una sola palabra saliera de su boca.

languages.text: Trotz der brutalen Folter und verschiedener überzeugender, bewusstseinserweiternder Substanzen, die dem Gefangenen von einem weisen Techpriester verabreicht wurden, behielt der Bastard sein arrogantes Schweigen bei. Er starb, bevor auch nur ein einziges Wort über seine Lippen kam.
languages.original_text: Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

traits.locale_text: Trotz der brutalen Folter und verschiedener überzeugender, bewusstseinserweiternder Substanzen, die dem Gefangenen von einem weisen Techpriester verabreicht wurden, behielt der Bastard sein arrogantes Schweigen bei. Er starb, bevor auch nur ein einziges Wort über seine Lippen kam.

languages.text: Malgré la torture et les diverses substances psychotropes qu'un technoprêtre particulièrement zélé lui injecte dans le système sanguin, le prisonnier se mure dans un silence arrogant et succombe sans décrocher un traître mot.
languages.original_text: Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.

traits.locale_text: Malgré la torture et les diverses substances psychotropes qu'un technoprêtre particulièrement zélé lui injecte dans le système sanguin, le prisonnier se mure dans un silence arrogant et succombe sans décrocher un traître mot.

languages.text: Mahkûm acımasızca işkence gördü ve bilge bir Tekno Rahip tarafından kanına çeşitli ikna edici ve algı bozucu maddeler katıldı. Buna rağmen şerefsiz herif küstahça sessizliğini korudu ve ağzını bıçak açmadan can verdi.
languages.original_text: Despite the brutal torture and various persuasive, mind-altering solutions administered into the prisoner's bloodstream by a wise Tech-Priest, the bastard maintained his arrogant silence and perished before a single word escaped his lips.
